programme.title: Operation Pisces: Money Laundering For The Medellin Cartel
programme.desc: DEA Agent JD Miller is laundering money for the Medellin cartel. He needs help with the sheer volume of cash pickups so he brings in veteran undercover operative Louis Diaz to manage the West Coast operations. Together, JD and Louis run a scheme that also funds the DEA's evidence building efforts against Colombian kingpin, Jose Lopez. When they have enough recorded conversations and seized evidence against the kingpin, they take down Lopez and unearth his sprawling criminal enterprise.

programme.title: Operation Black Coral: Intercepting Caribbean Coke
programme.desc: Sarasota detective, Jim Sweeting, infiltrates the vicious Cuban cocaine pipeline controlled by the Medellin cartel. The agent re-invents himself and takes on an alias of a drug trafficker to collect evidence and break the back of the source. Along the way Sweeting enters a violent drugs and money world guided only by his wits and a trusted confidential informant. To bust the dealers and stay alive he must put in the performance of a lifetime or be exposed, and killed.

programme.title: Operation Wake Up Cafe: Illegal Betting In Jersey
programme.desc: Passaic County, New Jersey officer Julia Torres goes undercover to bust an illegal betting club entrenched in the Little Italy neighborhood. As a woman running the operation dominated by male wise guys, it's a constant juggling act to collect evidence while not being made as a cop. Along the way, Torres life-saving efforts on a small boy nearly expose her and the operation. She manages to record conversations and bring down the backroom gambling operation to the delight of neighbors who applaud her efforts.

programme.title: Steamy Lessons
programme.desc: A pregnant wife killed execution style. and an EMT intent on taking a life.

programme.title: Operation Pisces: Money Laundering For The Medellin Cartel
programme.desc: DEA Agent JD Miller is laundering money for the Medellin cartel. He needs help with the sheer volume of cash pickups so he brings in veteran undercover operative Louis Diaz to manage the West Coast operations. Together, JD and Louis run a scheme that also funds the DEA's evidence building efforts against Colombian kingpin, Jose Lopez. When they have enough recorded conversations and seized evidence against the kingpin, they take down Lopez and unearth his sprawling criminal enterprise.

programme.title: Operation Black Coral: Intercepting Caribbean Coke
programme.desc: Sarasota detective, Jim Sweeting, infiltrates the vicious Cuban cocaine pipeline controlled by the Medellin cartel. The agent re-invents himself and takes on an alias of a drug trafficker to collect evidence and break the back of the source. Along the way Sweeting enters a violent drugs and money world guided only by his wits and a trusted confidential informant. To bust the dealers and stay alive he must put in the performance of a lifetime or be exposed, and killed.

programme.title: Operation Dead Ringer: Busting Escobar's Cartel
programme.desc: Bill Gately and the U.S. Customs Service discover the owner of a coin laundry is laundering large sums of cash through a bank that originates from Columbia. Gately learns that one of the sources of the cash is none other than Pablo Escobar. Gately goes undercover and uses the man as a Trojan Horse to purchase one ton of cocaine, and follows the drugs to its destination. Along the way, the FBI bullies into the operation and loses the coke. Gately pulls out the stops to save his case and arrest those involved.

programme.title: Operation Wake Up Cafe: Illegal Betting In Jersey
programme.desc: Passaic County, New Jersey officer Julia Torres goes undercover to bust an illegal betting club entrenched in the Little Italy neighborhood. As a woman running the operation dominated by male wise guys, it's a constant juggling act to collect evidence while not being made as a cop. Along the way, Torres life-saving efforts on a small boy nearly expose her and the operation. She manages to record conversations and bring down the backroom gambling operation to the delight of neighbors who applaud her efforts.

Along the way Sweeting enters a violent drugs and money world guided only by his wits and a trusted confidential informant. To bust the dealers and stay alive he must put in the performance of a lifetime or be exposed, and killed.

programme.title: Operation Wake Up Cafe: Illegal Betting In Jersey
programme.desc: Passaic County, New Jersey officer Julia Torres goes undercover to bust an illegal betting club entrenched in the Little Italy neighborhood. As a woman running the operation dominated by male wise guys, it's a constant juggling act to collect evidence while not being made as a cop. Along the way, Torres life-saving efforts on a small boy nearly expose her and the operation. She manages to record conversations and bring down the backroom gambling operation to the delight of neighbors who applaud her efforts.

programme.title: Operation Pisces: Money Laundering For The Medellin Cartel
programme.desc: DEA Agent JD Miller is laundering money for the Medellin cartel. He needs help with the sheer volume of cash pickups so he brings in veteran undercover operative Louis Diaz to manage the West Coast operations. Together, JD and Louis run a scheme that also funds the DEA's evidence building efforts against Colombian kingpin, Jose Lopez. When they have enough recorded conversations and seized evidence against the kingpin, they take down Lopez and unearth his sprawling criminal enterprise.

programme.title: Operation Black Coral: Intercepting Caribbean Coke
programme.desc: Sarasota detective, Jim Sweeting, infiltrates the vicious Cuban cocaine pipeline controlled by the Medellin cartel. The agent re-invents himself and takes on an alias of a drug trafficker to collect evidence and break the back of the source. Along the way Sweeting enters a violent drugs and money world guided only by his wits and a trusted confidential informant. To bust the dealers and stay alive he must put in the performance of a lifetime or be exposed, and killed.

programme.title: Operation Dead Ringer: Busting Escobar's Cartel
programme.desc: Bill Gately and the U.S. Customs Service discover the owner of a coin laundry is laundering large sums of cash through a bank that originates from Columbia. Gately learns that one of the sources of the cash is none other than Pablo Escobar. Gately goes undercover and uses the man as a Trojan Horse to purchase one ton of cocaine, and follows the drugs to its destination. Along the way, the FBI bullies into the operation and loses the coke. Gately pulls out the stops to save his case and arrest those involved.

programme.title: The Moses Diaries
programme.desc: 'Moses' captures the reality of war through his own camera, offering a raw, unfiltered perspective on the sacrifices of a Ukrainian generation fighting for freedom and a window into the grim realities of the frontline that Ukraine commanders do not want the world to see.

programme.title: Descent Into Anarchy

programme.title: 21st Century Arms Race
programme.desc: Israeli defense experts shed light on advances in artificial intelligence and machine learning in the military defense sector.

programme.title: The Race To Forecast Weather
programme.desc: Today, 24-hour forecasts are 95% reliable and 3-day forecasts are 80% reliable. How do scientists predict the weather and, each year, improve their predictions? It's a race against time using the latest technologies.

programme.title: Miami Beach Underwater
programme.desc: As scientific studies confirm sea level changes throughout the globe, major coastal cities like Miami are now fighting back against these rising tides, before it's too late. Parts of Miami Beach are under serious threat.

programme.title: World Without Water
programme.desc: Hundreds of millions of people around the world could run out of water soon. Experts are desperately searching for solutions to stave off "Day Zero" when the taps will run dry.

programme.title: News 5 at 6
programme.desc: News 5 Cleveland WEWS: Watch on your schedule. The latest news in Cleveland, Ohio — weather, traffic and sports.

programme.title: Replay: News 5 at 6
programme.desc: News 5 Cleveland WEWS: Watch on your schedule. The latest news in Cleveland, Ohio — weather, traffic and sports.

programme.title: Operation Pisces: Money Laundering For The Medellin Cartel
programme.desc: DEA Agent JD Miller is laundering money for the Medellin cartel. He needs help with the sheer volume of cash pickups so he brings in veteran undercover operative Louis Diaz to manage the West Coast operations. Together, JD and Louis run a scheme that also funds the DEA's evidence building efforts against Colombian kingpin, Jose Lopez. When they have enough recorded conversations and seized evidence against the kingpin, they take down Lopez and unearth his sprawling criminal enterprise.

programme.title: Operation Black Coral: Intercepting Caribbean Coke
programme.desc: Sarasota detective, Jim Sweeting, infiltrates the vicious Cuban cocaine pipeline controlled by the Medellin cartel. The agent re-invents himself and takes on an alias of a drug trafficker to collect evidence and break the back of the source. Along the way Sweeting enters a violent drugs and money world guided only by his wits and a trusted confidential informant. To bust the dealers and stay alive he must put in the performance of a lifetime or be exposed, and killed.

programme.title: Operation Dead Ringer: Busting Escobar's Cartel
programme.desc: Bill Gately and the U.S. Customs Service discover the owner of a coin laundry is laundering large sums of cash through a bank that originates from Columbia. Gately learns that one of the sources of the cash is none other than Pablo Escobar. Gately goes undercover and uses the man as a Trojan Horse to purchase one ton of cocaine, and follows the drugs to its destination. Along the way, the FBI bullies into the operation and loses the coke. Gately pulls out the stops to save his case and arrest those involved.

programme.title: Operation Wake Up Cafe: Illegal Betting In Jersey
programme.desc: Passaic County, New Jersey officer Julia Torres goes undercover to bust an illegal betting club entrenched in the Little Italy neighborhood. As a woman running the operation dominated by male wise guys, it's a constant juggling act to collect evidence while not being made as a cop. Along the way, Torres life-saving efforts on a small boy nearly expose her and the operation. She manages to record conversations and bring down the backroom gambling operation to the delight of neighbors who applaud her efforts.

programme.title: Operation Pisces: Money Laundering For The Medellin Cartel
programme.desc: DEA Agent JD Miller is laundering money for the Medellin cartel. He needs help with the sheer volume of cash pickups so he brings in veteran undercover operative Louis Diaz to manage the West Coast operations. Together, JD and Louis run a scheme that also funds the DEA's evidence building efforts against Colombian kingpin, Jose Lopez. When they have enough recorded conversations and seized evidence against the kingpin, they take down Lopez and unearth his sprawling criminal enterprise.

programme.title: Operation Black Coral: Intercepting Caribbean Coke
programme.desc: Sarasota detective, Jim Sweeting, infiltrates the vicious Cuban cocaine pipeline controlled by the Medellin cartel. The agent re-invents himself and takes on an alias of a drug trafficker to collect evidence and break the back of the source. Along the way Sweeting enters a violent drugs and money world guided only by his wits and a trusted confidential informant. To bust the dealers and stay alive he must put in the performance of a lifetime or be exposed, and killed.

programme.title: Operation Dead Ringer: Busting Escobar's Cartel
programme.desc: Bill Gately and the U.S. Customs Service discover the owner of a coin laundry is laundering large sums of cash through a bank that originates from Columbia. Gately learns that one of the sources of the cash is none other than Pablo Escobar. Gately goes undercover and uses the man as a Trojan Horse to purchase one ton of cocaine, and follows the drugs to its destination. Along the way, the FBI bullies into the operation and loses the coke. Gately pulls out the stops to save his case and arrest those involved.

programme.title: Operation Wake Up Cafe: Illegal Betting In Jersey
programme.desc: Passaic County, New Jersey officer Julia Torres goes undercover to bust an illegal betting club entrenched in the Little Italy neighborhood. As a woman running the operation dominated by male wise guys, it's a constant juggling act to collect evidence while not being made as a cop. Along the way, Torres life-saving efforts on a small boy nearly expose her and the operation. She manages to record conversations and bring down the backroom gambling operation to the delight of neighbors who applaud her efforts.

programme.title: Best Deals of the Week
programme.desc: Deal expert Albert Lawrence breaks down the latest and greatest deals. Shop while you watch: just head to the Amazon shopping app on mobile and type "shop the show" in the search bar!

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen: The Next Generation
programme.sub-title: Too Many Cooks in the Kitchen
programme.desc: This week, the 8 remaining cooks must team up in pairs to tackle a media challenge showcasing simple how-tos. Then in the Test challenge, they team up again to create a meal fit for a modern dinner party. Guest Judge, Melissa King, along with Dan Souza and Jack Bishop, will decide which team is on top, and which cook from the bottom team will be leaving the Test Kitchen for good.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen: The Next Generation
programme.desc: This week, the Task challenge has the cooks faced with mystery ingredients picked by ATK's beloved cast. Cooks Country star Bryan Roof stops by to offer his favorite ingredients and help judge the cooks' dishes. In the Test, the legendary Pati Jinich presents our cooks with the unique challenge of creating a dish with only four ingredients!

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen: The Next Generation
programme.desc: It’s a party this week at America’s Test Kitchen! The 6 remaining cooks compete in challenges revolving around party food. The Task dares them to make an appetizer version of popular ATK main courses. Then Jeannie recruits the cooks’ own family members to bring the holidays to the Test Kitchen. Chef Joe Sasto joins judges Dan Souza and Julia Collin Davison in an emotional and celebratory episode.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen: The Next Generation
programme.desc: After a surprising test with no elimination, 6 cooks still remain. This week, the Task is to create, style and photograph a gift basket with a unique flavor profile. The winner gets a secret advantage! Next, we're going around the world in the Test with three-dish cuisine-themed food towers. Comedian Punkie Johnson guests.

programme.title: Best Deals of the Week
programme.desc: Deal expert Albert Lawrence breaks down the latest and greatest deals. Shop while you watch: just head to the Amazon shopping app on mobile and type "shop the show" in the search bar!

programme.title: Wear Whatever the F You Want
programme.desc: Aspiring artist Akemi has left a corporate job to pursue her dream as a visionary artist, but she struggles with personal style and craves her parents' approval. Enter Stacy and Clinton, ready to create a bold, artsy look that truly reflects her creative spirit. Together, they empower Akemi to embrace her vibrant identity, boosting her confidence to thrive as the artist she was meant to be.

programme.title: Wear Whatever the F You Want
programme.desc: Clinton and Stacy take on their most exciting challenge yet with Alan, a recently transitioned trans man seeking a bold, androgynous style. After years of prioritizing comfort over self-expression, Alan is ready to embrace a look that defies traditional norms. Together, they craft a style that brings Alan a true joy that is uniquely his own, breaking the rules of fashion along the way.

programme.title: Wear Whatever the F You Want
programme.desc: Clinton and Stacy meet Naomi, former Amish and ex-stripper, who is seeking help after reverting to traditional Amish dress to hide her post-pregnancy body. Now back on the farm and raising a toddler, she yearns for the confidence she felt during her stripper days. Clinton and Stacy help Naomi find a style that both reclaims her femininity and balances her life as a new mom with a country heart.

programme.title: Amazon Wish List Games
programme.sub-title: Will They Win a Cold Plunge, Tennis Machine and Drum Set?
programme.desc: Nick Cannon and Lele Pons present Amazon Wish List Games where one contestant tries to win items to up his fitness game, a woodworker plays to win essentials to expand her business and someone wants to win a patio for their cat! Will they secure their dream items? Can anyone clear their list? Plus, everyone gets the chance to play the end game--will the whole audience go home a winner?

programme.title: Amazon Wish List Games
programme.sub-title: Will They Win a Riding Mower, Smart Fridge and Electric Guitar?
programme.desc: Nick Cannon and Lele Pons present Amazon Wish List Games where a gardening teacher hopes to win items to help teach, a student tries to win essentials for his studies abroad and one contestant dreams of starting a podcast with her wishlist. Will they secure their dream items? Can anyone clear their list? Plus, everyone gets the chance to play the end game--will the whole audience go home a winner?

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.desc: Steven Rinella teams up with Joe Rogan in Nevada's high desert to bowhunt for elusive mule deer bucks. Surrounded by vast public lands and rugged terrain, they navigate the challenges of close-range stalking with their bows. With Joe's enthusiasm for archery and Steve's experience, the duo pushes their limits in pursuit of these wary deer, embracing the highs and lows of hunting in one of America's most unforgiving landscapes.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.desc: Steve and Janis are deep in the wilderness of eastern Alaska on a challenging moose and caribou hunt. Joined by Janis' father, Papa Jani, who wants one last adventure before age catches up, they endure the highs and lows of remote hunting. With patience wearing thin and the weather turning, the group pushes through thick willows and foggy mornings, hoping for a bit of luck and a successful hunt before their journey's end.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.desc: Steve and Janis are deep in the wilderness of eastern Alaska on a challenging moose and caribou hunt. Joined by Janis' father, Papa Jani, who wants one last adventure before age catches up, they endure the highs and lows of remote hunting. With patience wearing thin and the weather turning, the group pushes through thick willows and foggy mornings, hoping for a bit of luck and a successful hunt before their journey's end.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.desc: Steven Rinella heads back to his fish shack on Prince of Wales Island in Southeast Alaska, this time with friend and colleague Morgan Fallon. Known for his cinematography, Mo now wants to switch roles from behind the camera to filling his freezer. Together, they embark on a classic Alaskan adventure: fishing for rockfish, setting shrimp pots, and hunting Sitka blacktail deer, all while reminiscing about past trips and discovering new ways the wilderness shapes them.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.desc: Steve and his friend Ronny Boehme head to the vast sagebrush seas of Southeast Wyoming to hunt America's largest game bird, the sage grouse. Known for their size and elusive nature, these birds offer a challenging hunt across open country. Joined by local experts, they explore the complexities of sage grouse conservation and hunting, testing their patience and skills in pursuit of these storied birds.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.desc: Late October in Southeast Alaska finds Steve, Ryan Callahan, and Mark Borman chasing Sitka blacktail deer. As the bucks begin their descent from the alpine into dense timber, the trio faces the challenge of hunting in the thick, damp rainforest. While navigating through muskeg patches and testing their luck with calling techniques, they must contend with unpredictable weather and tough terrain. When deer prove elusive, they turn to fishing and foraging.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.desc: Midway through a challenging hunt on Prince of Wales Island, Steve, Ryan Callahan, and Mark Borman are searching for Sitka blacktail deer. The rut hasn‚Äôt kicked in as expected, leaving the hunters frustrated and the deer elusive. Adapting their strategies, they decide to split up and quietly stalk through dense woods and muskeg. After days of patience and perseverance, a mix of skill, luck, and determination finally leads them closer to success.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.desc: In the bitter cold of Montana's Bitterroot Mountains, Steve teams up with Remi Warren for the closing days of the general elk season. Facing steep hills and frigid winds, they navigate public lands where competition is fierce, and success is hard-won. As they track elk across challenging terrain, Remi and Steve split up to increase their chances. A tense and calculated hunt unfolds, leading to a final showdown with two elusive bulls.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.desc: Deep in the heart of Guyana's jungle, Steve teams up with Macushi guides Roven and Dennis to explore the wild Riwa River. They fish for piranhas and massive catfish, employing traditional methods passed down through generations. As they camp along the river, the crew learns the intricate skills of the Macushi, from crafting bows and arrows using natural materials to preparing their catch over a slow-burning fire. The journey is a raw adventure into survival, skill, and pragmatism.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.desc: Deep in the heart of Guyana's jungle, Steve teams up with Macushi guides Roven and Dennis to explore the wild Riwa River. programme.title: MeatEater
programme.desc: In the rugged terrain of central Colorado, Steven Rinella and his friend Brody Henderson set out to hunt mule deer amidst aspen groves and sagebrush. Navigating unseasonably warm November weather, they face challenges in tracking down the elusive deer as the heat pushes the animals into cooler, shaded areas. After several attempts, including a close encounter thwarted by coyotes, the duo finally spots a promising buck.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.desc: Amidst the dense fog and relentless rain of Afognak Island, Steve and Remi embark on a challenging elk hunt, navigating rugged terrain and the constant presence of brown bears. As visibility dwindles and the weather worsens, they push forward in one of the most unpredictable environments. It‚Äôs a hunt that demands resilience, patience, and a deep respect for the wilderness.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.desc: Steve heads to the interior of Alaska with his friends Doug Duren and Mark Kenyon for an adventure amidst the caribou migration. Navigating rough terrain and unpredictable weather, they set up camp and begin the search for large, mature bulls. With thousands of caribou on the move and only a few days to hunt, the team experiences the excitement and unpredictability of caribou hunting in the heart of Alaska‚Äôs wilderness.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.desc: Continuing their adventure in Alaska‚Äôs interior, Steve, Doug, and Mark push deeper into the caribou migration. With Doug still hoping to take his first bull, the team sets up on a high ridge, watching caribou stream across the landscape. They face grizzly bears, dense fog, and the ever-changing weather of the Alaskan wilderness. As the days pass, they work together to intercept a herd of caribou, knowing their window could close.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.desc: In this episode, Steven Rinella steps out of the field and into the kitchen to showcase some of his favorite wild game recipes. From wild turkey sausage and smoked trout to venison ribs and duck breast, he shares simple yet sophisticated ways to prepare these dishes. This cooking masterclass is a celebration of wild game, offering both seasoned hunters and novice cooks new ways to enjoy the fruits of their hunts.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.desc: Steve heads to the panhandle of Idaho to join wildlife biologist and dedicated houndsman Bart George for a mountain lion hunt. Bruce Dunkin, Bart's mentor and hunting buddy, joins the crew as they attempt to cut a cat's track and let the dogs loose for a hunt in the deep timber of the Idaho mountains.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.desc: Steven Rinella and Evan Hafer head into Southeast Alaska's coastal rainforest to hunt Sitka black-tailed deer. Using deer calls and antler rattling to mimic buck fights, they navigate through thick muskegs and challenging terrain. Despite tough weather conditions and elusive game, the two friends adapt to the conditions and stick it out, making the most of their hunt.

programme.title: Descent Into Anarchy

programme.title: 21st Century Arms Race
programme.desc: Israeli defense experts shed light on advances in artificial intelligence and machine learning in the military defense sector.

programme.title: The Race To Forecast Weather
programme.desc: Today, 24-hour forecasts are 95% reliable and 3-day forecasts are 80% reliable. How do scientists predict the weather and, each year, improve their predictions? It's a race against time using the latest technologies.

programme.title: Miami Beach Underwater
programme.desc: As scientific studies confirm sea level changes throughout the globe, major coastal cities like Miami are now fighting back against these rising tides, before it's too late. Parts of Miami Beach are under serious threat.

programme.title: World Without Water
programme.desc: Hundreds of millions of people around the world could run out of water soon. Experts are desperately searching for solutions to stave off "Day Zero" when the taps will run dry.

programme.title: WPTV News at 6
programme.desc: WPTV in West Palm Beach - The latest local and national news and local weather, traffic and sports.

programme.title: Replay: WPTV News at 6
programme.desc: WPTV in West Palm Beach - The latest local and national news and local weather, traffic and sports.

programme.title: Operation Pisces: Money Laundering For The Medellin Cartel
programme.desc: DEA Agent JD Miller is laundering money for the Medellin cartel. He needs help with the sheer volume of cash pickups so he brings in veteran undercover operative Louis Diaz to manage the West Coast operations. Together, JD and Louis run a scheme that also funds the DEA's evidence building efforts against Colombian kingpin, Jose Lopez. When they have enough recorded conversations and seized evidence against the kingpin, they take down Lopez and unearth his sprawling criminal enterprise.

programme.title: Operation Black Coral: Intercepting Caribbean Coke
programme.desc: Sarasota detective, Jim Sweeting, infiltrates the vicious Cuban cocaine pipeline controlled by the Medellin cartel. The agent re-invents himself and takes on an alias of a drug trafficker to collect evidence and break the back of the source. Along the way Sweeting enters a violent drugs and money world guided only by his wits and a trusted confidential informant. To bust the dealers and stay alive he must put in the performance of a lifetime or be exposed, and killed.

programme.title: Operation Dead Ringer: Busting Escobar's Cartel
programme.desc: Bill Gately and the U.S. Customs Service discover the owner of a coin laundry is laundering large sums of cash through a bank that originates from Columbia. Gately learns that one of the sources of the cash is none other than Pablo Escobar. Gately goes undercover and uses the man as a Trojan Horse to purchase one ton of cocaine, and follows the drugs to its destination. Along the way, the FBI bullies into the operation and loses the coke. Gately pulls out the stops to save his case and arrest those involved.

programme.title: Operation Wake Up Cafe: Illegal Betting In Jersey
programme.desc: Passaic County, New Jersey officer Julia Torres goes undercover to bust an illegal betting club entrenched in the Little Italy neighborhood. As a woman running the operation dominated by male wise guys, it's a constant juggling act to collect evidence while not being made as a cop. Along the way, Torres life-saving efforts on a small boy nearly expose her and the operation. She manages to record conversations and bring down the backroom gambling operation to the delight of neighbors who applaud her efforts.

programme.title: Operation Pisces: Money Laundering For The Medellin Cartel
programme.desc: DEA Agent JD Miller is laundering money for the Medellin cartel. He needs help with the sheer volume of cash pickups so he brings in veteran undercover operative Louis Diaz to manage the West Coast operations. Together, JD and Louis run a scheme that also funds the DEA's evidence building efforts against Colombian kingpin, Jose Lopez. When they have enough recorded conversations and seized evidence against the kingpin, they take down Lopez and unearth his sprawling criminal enterprise.

programme.title: Operation Black Coral: Intercepting Caribbean Coke
programme.desc: Sarasota detective, Jim Sweeting, infiltrates the vicious Cuban cocaine pipeline controlled by the Medellin cartel. The agent re-invents himself and takes on an alias of a drug trafficker to collect evidence and break the back of the source. Along the way Sweeting enters a violent drugs and money world guided only by his wits and a trusted confidential informant. To bust the dealers and stay alive he must put in the performance of a lifetime or be exposed, and killed.

programme.title: Operation Dead Ringer: Busting Escobar's Cartel
programme.desc: Bill Gately and the U.S. Customs Service discover the owner of a coin laundry is laundering large sums of cash through a bank that originates from Columbia. Gately learns that one of the sources of the cash is none other than Pablo Escobar. Gately goes undercover and uses the man as a Trojan Horse to purchase one ton of cocaine, and follows the drugs to its destination. Along the way, the FBI bullies into the operation and loses the coke. Gately pulls out the stops to save his case and arrest those involved.

programme.title: Operation Wake Up Cafe: Illegal Betting In Jersey
programme.desc: Passaic County, New Jersey officer Julia Torres goes undercover to bust an illegal betting club entrenched in the Little Italy neighborhood. As a woman running the operation dominated by male wise guys, it's a constant juggling act to collect evidence while not being made as a cop. Along the way, Torres life-saving efforts on a small boy nearly expose her and the operation. She manages to record conversations and bring down the backroom gambling operation to the delight of neighbors who applaud her efforts.

programme.desc: Today, 24-hour forecasts are 95% reliable and 3-day forecasts are 80% reliable. How do scientists predict the weather and, each year, improve their predictions? It's a race against time using the latest technologies.

programme.title: Miami Beach Underwater
programme.desc: As scientific studies confirm sea level changes throughout the globe, major coastal cities like Miami are now fighting back against these rising tides, before it's too late. Parts of Miami Beach are under serious threat.

programme.title: World Without Water
programme.desc: Hundreds of millions of people around the world could run out of water soon. Experts are desperately searching for solutions to stave off "Day Zero" when the taps will run dry.

programme.title: 7 News Detroit at 6PM
programme.desc: WXYZ 7 Action News is Detroit's breaking news and weather leader. Channel 7 - on-air, online at WXYZ.com and always Taking Action for You.

programme.title: Replay: 7 News Detroit at 6
programme.desc: WXYZ is Detroit's breaking news and weather leader. 7 News Detroit - on-air and online at WXYZ.com.

programme.title: Metroparks: Endless Experiences
programme.desc: Planning your summer? Plan on fun with Huron-Clinton Metroparks. Watch our special to check out all of the great activities and experiences that are right outside your door.

programme.title: Operation Black Coral: Intercepting Caribbean Coke
programme.desc: Sarasota detective, Jim Sweeting, infiltrates the vicious Cuban cocaine pipeline controlled by the Medellin cartel. The agent re-invents himself and takes on an alias of a drug trafficker to collect evidence and break the back of the source. Along the way Sweeting enters a violent drugs and money world guided only by his wits and a trusted confidential informant. To bust the dealers and stay alive he must put in the performance of a lifetime or be exposed, and killed.

programme.title: Operation Dead Ringer: Busting Escobar's Cartel
programme.desc: Bill Gately and the U.S. Customs Service discover the owner of a coin laundry is laundering large sums of cash through a bank that originates from Columbia. Gately learns that one of the sources of the cash is none other than Pablo Escobar. Gately goes undercover and uses the man as a Trojan Horse to purchase one ton of cocaine, and follows the drugs to its destination. Along the way, the FBI bullies into the operation and loses the coke. Gately pulls out the stops to save his case and arrest those involved.

programme.title: Operation Wake Up Cafe: Illegal Betting In Jersey
programme.desc: Passaic County, New Jersey officer Julia Torres goes undercover to bust an illegal betting club entrenched in the Little Italy neighborhood. As a woman running the operation dominated by male wise guys, it's a constant juggling act to collect evidence while not being made as a cop. Along the way, Torres life-saving efforts on a small boy nearly expose her and the operation. She manages to record conversations and bring down the backroom gambling operation to the delight of neighbors who applaud her efforts.

programme.title: The National Report
programme.desc: Join Scripps News journalists for fast-paced headlines and stories from across America.

programme.title: Arizona Crime Uncovered: Where is Cookie Jacobson?
programme.desc: Just days after Cookie Jacobson's 49th birthday, Bill Jacobson said he kissed his wife goodbye around 7:00 a.m. and left for work. That was the last time Bill ever saw his wife, and more than two decades later, it's not known what happened to Cookie. Ashley Holden sat down with Cookie's family as they push for answers all these years later.

programme.title: Operation Pisces: Money Laundering For The Medellin Cartel
programme.desc: DEA Agent JD Miller is laundering money for the Medellin cartel. He needs help with the sheer volume of cash pickups so he brings in veteran undercover operative Louis Diaz to manage the West Coast operations. Together, JD and Louis run a scheme that also funds the DEA's evidence building efforts against Colombian kingpin, Jose Lopez. When they have enough recorded conversations and seized evidence against the kingpin, they take down Lopez and unearth his sprawling criminal enterprise.

programme.title: Operation Black Coral: Intercepting Caribbean Coke
programme.desc: Sarasota detective, Jim Sweeting, infiltrates the vicious Cuban cocaine pipeline controlled by the Medellin cartel. The agent re-invents himself and takes on an alias of a drug trafficker to collect evidence and break the back of the source. Along the way Sweeting enters a violent drugs and money world guided only by his wits and a trusted confidential informant. To bust the dealers and stay alive he must put in the performance of a lifetime or be exposed, and killed.

programme.title: Operation Dead Ringer: Busting Escobar's Cartel
programme.desc: Bill Gately and the U.S. Customs Service discover the owner of a coin laundry is laundering large sums of cash through a bank that originates from Columbia. Gately learns that one of the sources of the cash is none other than Pablo Escobar. Gately goes undercover and uses the man as a Trojan Horse to purchase one ton of cocaine, and follows the drugs to its destination. Along the way, the FBI bullies into the operation and loses the coke. Gately pulls out the stops to save his case and arrest those involved.

programme.title: Operation Wake Up Cafe: Illegal Betting In Jersey
programme.desc: Passaic County, New Jersey officer Julia Torres goes undercover to bust an illegal betting club entrenched in the Little Italy neighborhood. As a woman running the operation dominated by male wise guys, it's a constant juggling act to collect evidence while not being made as a cop. Along the way, Torres life-saving efforts on a small boy nearly expose her and the operation. She manages to record conversations and bring down the backroom gambling operation to the delight of neighbors who applaud her efforts.

Along the way, the FBI bullies into the operation and loses the coke. Gately pulls out the stops to save his case and arrest those involved.

programme.title: Operation Wake Up Cafe: Illegal Betting In Jersey
programme.desc: Passaic County, New Jersey officer Julia Torres goes undercover to bust an illegal betting club entrenched in the Little Italy neighborhood. As a woman running the operation dominated by male wise guys, it's a constant juggling act to collect evidence while not being made as a cop. Along the way, Torres life-saving efforts on a small boy nearly expose her and the operation. She manages to record conversations and bring down the backroom gambling operation to the delight of neighbors who applaud her efforts.

programme.title: Operation Pisces: Money Laundering For The Medellin Cartel
programme.desc: DEA Agent JD Miller is laundering money for the Medellin cartel. He needs help with the sheer volume of cash pickups so he brings in veteran undercover operative Louis Diaz to manage the West Coast operations. Together, JD and Louis run a scheme that also funds the DEA's evidence building efforts against Colombian kingpin, Jose Lopez. When they have enough recorded conversations and seized evidence against the kingpin, they take down Lopez and unearth his sprawling criminal enterprise.

programme.title: Operation Black Coral: Intercepting Caribbean Coke
programme.desc: Sarasota detective, Jim Sweeting, infiltrates the vicious Cuban cocaine pipeline controlled by the Medellin cartel. The agent re-invents himself and takes on an alias of a drug trafficker to collect evidence and break the back of the source. Along the way Sweeting enters a violent drugs and money world guided only by his wits and a trusted confidential informant. To bust the dealers and stay alive he must put in the performance of a lifetime or be exposed, and killed.

programme.title: Operation Dead Ringer: Busting Escobar's Cartel
programme.desc: Bill Gately and the U.S. Customs Service discover the owner of a coin laundry is laundering large sums of cash through a bank that originates from Columbia. Gately learns that one of the sources of the cash is none other than Pablo Escobar. Gately goes undercover and uses the man as a Trojan Horse to purchase one ton of cocaine, and follows the drugs to its destination. Along the way, the FBI bullies into the operation and loses the coke. Gately pulls out the stops to save his case and arrest those involved.

programme.title: Operation Wake Up Cafe: Illegal Betting In Jersey
programme.desc: Passaic County, New Jersey officer Julia Torres goes undercover to bust an illegal betting club entrenched in the Little Italy neighborhood. She manages to record conversations and bring down the backroom gambling operation to the delight of neighbors who applaud her efforts.
